title: Ep. 24: 'The Watch' Re-up
description:
On today's re-up, Andy and Chris talk 'The People v. O.J. Simpson' (2:00), 'Better Call Saul' (12:30), very special sitcom episodes (19:00), the 1975's new album (28:00), and Oscar hopes (36:00).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
